question: One of the the consequences of improved medical care is that people are living longer and life expectancy is increasing. do you think the advantages of this development outweigh the disadvantages?
text: It is  undeniable fact that modern technology improves health facilities. Which help to save the life of many people, even if they face any fatal disease or they are injured in an accident. There is no doubt nowadays people live a long life as compared to a past time when there is a lack of  medical advancement. As far as my views are concerned that I believe better health improvement have more bone than bane. In this essay, I intend to discuss my viewpoints as per  my experience.

There are myriads of pros of moderate medical care. First and foremost, the masses have more time to spend  with their parents and grandparents and the guidance of the old hand always worked like a magic stick to deal with any kind of problem. Because  experience is the best teacher for understanding the  real problem of life. Also, some children lose their parents due to some kind of  incurable disease like diabetes and cancer. But now new medicine and therapy are able to save a life in this situation. Moreover, experience scientist leaders and doctors are more contribute to  the Wellness of the nation, Last but not least, due to  pollution and eating unhygienic food, bodies do not have a strong immune system to save themselves from ailment but Medical Science helpful to reduce the effect of this

Despite several benefits of high-class Health Care that drawback cannot be put on the backburner, if dwellers live longer and life expectancy is increasing, it put an extra burden on the exchequer,  the legislators spend a Huge amount of money to take care of the senior citizens like a free medical to financial support and they become a liability for the country ,not an asset. Furthermore, young people face problems like unemployment, lack of attention. However,  good medical conditions always is a good investment for the region like in epidemic and pandemic periods Medical Research useful to control and reduce the harmful  effects. For instance, in covid-19 as Medical Research world find the Vaccine of this illness

‌In the nutshell, it can be Reiterated that hospitals and Research centres are  able to surge  life of expectancy with their highly equipment and it is a positive development for  humanity but the government should give an intention to this issue to the young public do not be blind eyes.
